title: How to find the right music for your next GoPro video - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's one way to hone in on the right music for your video: First decide on the key that the music should be in. Different keys tend to evoke different moods. Characteristics of Musical KeyDecide on the style of music you want and find a selection written in the key best suited for the chosen mood.Then refine the style based on tempo, instrumentaion/vocals, ect.
what is "the right music". I just use music I find suiting for the movie I made. Or just something I like. Is there really a right or wrong?
